title: Introducing: Esbie Fonte
body:
This debut solo track from LA’s **Esbie Fonte** has really grown on me since hearing it a couple of weeks back.

There’s definitely elements of recent Norwegian success story Aurora to the vocals, and the songwriting almost feels like it finds it’s roots in folk music – poignant and delicately touching. Check out _Yesterday’s News_ below, both the rather tender video, and the Soundcloud embed.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
